summary:
The F-35 Lightning II is an advanced fighter jet made by Lockheed Martin. It's designed for many tasks, like air combat and attacking targets. There are three types: F-35A, F-35B, and F-35C, each with different ways to take off and land.

Many countries, especially NATO members, are helping to build and pay for these planes. The F-35 has had some issues, like being very expensive and taking a long time to make. It first flew in 2006 and is now used by the U.S. military and other countries. The U.S. plans to buy thousands of these jets to use for many years.
title: Lockheed Martin F-35 Lightning II
